entries.journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith wants you to hunt a kkorrwrot. Speak with Kint Zsam at the Hracca Glade gate camp. Kint can help you enter the Hracca glade and can tell you more about hunting a kkorrwrot.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith wants you to hunt a kkorrwrot. Speak with Kint Zsam at the Hracca Glade gate camp. Kint can help you enter the Hracca glade and can tell you more about hunting a kkorrwrot. Make sure he knows that Johnson Smith sent you.
